item.title: Numbrs Review - App For Personal Finances (Germany & UK only)
item.description:
We all know that strong personal financial discipline is critical if you want to deal with the problems life will throw at you from time to time. Very helpful if you’re going to have a comfortable retirement.

Moreover, if you are shooting for financial independence or early retirement, it becomes ten times more important!

item.title: The Importance of Financial Independence For Software Developers
item.description: If you read this post, chances that you are a software developer who is seeking financial advice for smart money-saving or investment or early retirement.
